Description:
**SOLD BY BRANDON WHITTA**
CLYDE NORTH: The Selandra Rise estate really kicked off the boom in Clyde North and is one of the most sought after pockets in the area. 29 Palomino Avenue is still young, fresh and ideal for a family looking to put down some roots and begin a new life in this thriving development. With convenient access to Heather Grove Reserve Playground, Wilandra Rise Primary School, St. Peter's College and local shops the location is second to none!
Built by Simonds Homes some 5 years ago, this gem presents in stunning 'as new' condition. Beyond the modern facade, you step inside to find an immaculately presented residence featuring an open plan lounge/dining area that incorporates the hostess galley style kitchen. Complete with stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and a 900mm freestanding oven/stove, this has to be one of the main selling attractions!
There are 3 robed bedrooms, the master with a walk in wardrobe and a pristine ensuite to match the family bathroom and second toilet. Ducted heating is a natural inclusion and don't forget the split system air-conditioner to aid with seasonal respite.
Outside there's a double garage with remote door and internal access as well as a generous yard with a decked entertainment area and shed for added storage!
Created by well-known developers Stockland, Selandra Rise is designed around open outdoor areas creating an innovative, greener lifestyle. A uniquely planned community this terrific estate will cater to your every need. The grand plan offers a town centre with supermarket, retail and community centres, health and childcare services, Primary and Secondary schools with local employment and aged care facilities within an easy walk. You will have no trouble in creating the perfect work-life balance with the extensive parkland, multiple playgrounds catering for children of all ages, interconnected walking/bike tracks and sporting grounds!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this property is also only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, the Casey Fields football ground and the local aquatic centre.
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's selling, selling ..... SOLD!
